|vendor_id = 15e8 |device_id = 0131 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = IOU0630S02 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Harris;HFA3841; |chip2 = Intersil;HFA3861; |chip3 = Intersil;HFA3683A; |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device is presumed to be a '''National Datacomm''' NWH630. :The specs. of the NWH630 have been assigned to this entry.
